members.name: Jordan
members.relation: Sam's sibling & lifelong partner in crime
members.bio: Has been Sam's biggest hype person since day one. Known for legendary toast speeches and even more legendary dance moves.

members.name: Mike
members.bio: Sam and Mike survived four years of dorm life together. Mike introduced Sam to surfing (and to the concept of sunscreen).

members.name: Taylor
members.bio: Taylor and Sam have been friends since building sandcastles at age 5. Some things never change â€” the sandcastles just got bigger.

members.name: Casey
members.relation: Maria's best friend since high school
members.bio: Casey and Maria have been inseparable for over a decade. Casey is the reason Maria was at that fateful bonfire in 2019.

members.name: Riley
members.bio: Riley and Maria bonded over late-night study sessions and a shared love of bad horror movies. The tradition continues.

members.name: Morgan
members.bio: Family by blood, best friends by choice. Morgan has the best stories about Maria from childhood that may or may not come up in a toast.
